subslogan.en: Create 100% private groups for your friends, family and colleagues in less than a minute.

title.en: Your posts are encrypted before they even leave your computer.

explanation.en: This is done via AES-256 symmetric and ECC-384 asymmetric encryption.

title.en: Only your group members have the keys to decrypt your posts.

explanation.en: No one else has access. Not ad agencies. Not third parties. Not even us.

title.en: Your password is never stored on our servers.

explanation.en: It doesn't even get sent across the Internet. This is done with the Secure Remote Password protocol.

title.en: Oops! You caught us before we're ready.

subtitle.en: Leave us your email and we'll let you know when Syme is out.

title.en: Thank you! We'll keep you notified.

subtitle.en: Help us get the word out:

tweet_text.en: Syme, the encrypted social network. Because it's nobody's business but yours.
